TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void PreviewHandler(object o, PreviewArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed PreviewHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the PreviewHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the PreviewHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the PreviewHandler is removed from the event.
